headline: International Flavors & Fragrances (NYSE:IFF) Declares US$0.40 Per Share Dividend
summary: International Flavors & Fragrances (NYSE:IFF) announced a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.40 per share, reflecting its ongoing commitment to shareholder value, with payment set for April 11, 2025. This dividend affirmation may have influenced the company's modest share price move of 0.84% over the past week, as investors often view consistent dividends as a positive signal of financial health. This occurred against a backdrop of broader market volatility where the major indices,...
